Item ID12199

The Ancient crozier is part of the Ancient vestment set. To wield one, the player needs at least 60 Prayer.

The crozier is equipped as a staff in the weapons slot and counts as an Zarosian item within the God Wars Dungeon.

 Attack bonuses
+7-1+25+10+0
 Defence bonuses
+2+3+1+10+0
 Other bonusesSlot

[[File:Ancient crozier detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''Ancient crozier''' is part of the [[Ancient vestment set]]. To wield one, the player needs at least 60 [[Prayer]].

The crozier is equipped as a [[Staves|staff]] in the [[weapons slot]] and counts as an Zarosian item within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
